On October 11, 2022, we hosted a conversation with Anand Giridharadas, the author of Winners Take All, our 2018 Business Book of the Year. He was joined by legendary academic, author, and political activist Noam Chomsky to discuss Anand’s new book, The Persuaders: At the Front Lines of the Fight for Hearts, Minds, and Democracy.
